# isIncluded

**Instance Property**

An error-throwing closure that indicates whether this filter should republish an element.

## Declaration

```swift
let isIncluded: (Upstream.Output) throws -> Bool
```

## Inspecting publisher properties

- **upstream**: The publisher from which this publisher receives elements.

items.description: The publisher from which this publisher receives elements.
items.name: upstream
